articles.description: Canara Bank revised its Repo Linked Lending Rate (RLLR) and Marginal Cost of Funds Based Lending Rate (MCFLR) (MCLR).  The new interest rates are effective from March 12, 2023.
articles.content: Canara Bank has revised the Repo Linked Lending Rate (RLLR) and Marginal Cost of Funds Based Lending Rate (MCLR). The new interest rates are effective from March 12, 2023, according to the BSE filing… [+2505 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Boeing plans India plants to convert 737 planes into freighters - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: India News: Boeing Co said on Friday it would set up a facility in India to convert 737 passenger planes into dedicated freighters to tap into regional and global
